Verses: 1 aindhunaalaikkuppinbu Piradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Ananiyaa Mooppargalodum Therththullu Ennum Oru Niyaayasaadhuriyanodumkoodap Ponaan, Avargal Pavulukku Virodhamaaith Dhesaadhibadhiyinidaththil Piraadhupanninaargal.
2 avan Azhaikkappattabodhu, Therththullu Kutranjaattaththodangi:

3 ganamporundhina Pelikse Ummaale Naangal Migundha Samaadhaana Savukkiyaththai Anubavikkiradhaiyum, Ummudaiya Paraamarippinaale Indhath Dhesaththaarukkuch Sirandha Nanmaigal Nadakkiradhaiyum Naangal Eppozhudhum Engum Migundha Nandriyaridhaludane Angigaarampannugirom.
4 ummai Naan Anega Vaarththaigalinaale Alattaadhapadikku, Naangal Surukkamaaich Solvadhai Neer Porumaiyaaik Ketkavendumendru Piraarththikkiren.

5 ennavendraal, Indha Manushan Kollainoyaakavum, Poochchakkaraththilulla Sagala Yoodhargalukkullum Kalagamezhuppugiravanaagavum, Nasareyarudaiya Madhapedhaththukku Mudhalaaliyaagavum Irukkiraanendru Kandarindhom.
6 ivan Dhevaalayaththaiyum Theettuppaduththap Paarththaan. Naangalo Ivanaippidiththu Engal Vedhappiramaanaththinpadiye Niyaayandheerkka Manadhaayirundhom.
7 appozhudhu Senaabadhiyaagiya Leesiyaa Vandhu, Migundha Balaadhkaaramaai Ivanai Engal Kaigalilirundhu Pariththukkondupoi,
8 ivanmel Kutranjaattukiravargal Ummidaththil Varumpadi Kattalaiyittaar. Ivanidaththil Neer Visaariththaal Naangal Ivanmel Saattugira Kutrangal Yaavaiyum Arindhukollalaam Endraan.
9 yoodhargalum Adharku Isaindhu, Ivaigal Yadhaarththandhaan Endraargal.

10 pavul Pesumpadi Dhesaadhibadhi Saigaikaattinabodhu, Avan Uththaravaaga: Neer Anega Varushakaalamaai Indhathdhesaththaarukku Niyaayaadhibadhiyaayirukkireerendrarindhu, Naan En Kaariyangalaikkuriththu Adhiga Dhairiyaththudan Uththaravu Sollugiren.
11 naan Thozhudhukollumpadiyaaga Erusalemukkup Ponadhumudhal Idhuvaraikkum Pannirandu Naalmaaththiram Aayitrendru Neer Arindhukollalaam.
12 dhevaalayaththile Naan Oruvaridaththilaavadhu Tharkkampanninadhaiyum, Naan Jebaaalayangalilaagilum Nagaraththilaagilum Janangalukkulle Kalagamezhuppinadhaiyum, Ivargal Kandadhillai.
13 ippozhudhu Enmel Saattugira Kutrangalai Ivargal Roobikkavumaattaargal.

14 ummidaththil Ondrai Oththukkollugiren; Adhennavendraal, Ivargal Madhapedham Endru Sollugira Maarkkaththinpadiye Engal Munnorgalin Dhevanukku Aaraadhanai Seydhu Niyaayappiramaanaththileyum Theerkkadharisigal Pusthakangalileyum Ezhudhiyirukkira Ellaavatraiyum Naan Visuvaasiththu,
15 needhimaangalum Aneedhimaangalumaagiya Mariththor Uyirththezhundhiruppadhu Undendru Ivargal Dhevanidaththil Nambikkaikondirukkiradhu Pola, Naanum Nambikkaikondirukkiren.
16 idhanaal Naan Dhevanukkum Manusharukkum Munbaaga Eppozhudhum Kutramatra Manach Saatchiyai Udaiyavanaayirukkap Pirayaasappadugiren.
17 anega Varushangalukkup Pinbu Naan En Janaththaarukkuth Dharmappanaththai Oppuvikkavum, Kaanikkaigalaich Seluththavum Vandhen.
18 appozhudhu Koottamillaamalum Amaliyillaamalum Aalayaththile Suththigariththukkondavanaayirukkaiyil, Aasiyaa Naattaaraana Sila Yoodhargal Ennaik Kandaargal.
19 avargalukku Enperil Virodhamaana Kaariyam Edhaagilum Undaayirundhaal, Avargale Inge Vandhu, Umakkumunbaagak Kutranjaattattum.
20 naan Aalosanai Sangaththaarukkumunbaaga Nindrabodhu Avargal Yaadhoru Aniyaayaththai Ennidaththil Kandadhundaanaal Ivargale Adhaichsollattum.

21 naan Avargalukkulle Nindrabodhu Mariththor Uyirththezhundhiruppadhaikkuriththu, Indru Ungalaale Niyaayantheerkkappadugirenendru Naan Sonna Oru Sollinimiththameyandri Verondrinimiththamum Kutrankaanappadavillai Endraan.
22 indha Maarkkaththin Vishayangalai Vivaramaai Arindhirundha Peliks Ivaigalaik Kettapozhudhu: Senaabadhiyaagiya Leesiyaa Varumbodhu Ungal Kaariyangalaith Thittamaai Visaarippen Endru Solli;

23 pavulaik Kaavalpannavum, Kandippillaamal Nadaththavum, Avanukku Oozhiyanjseygiradharkum Avanaik Kandukollugiradharkum Varugira Avanudaiya Manushargalil Oruvaraiyum Thadaiseyyaadhirukkavum Nootrukku Adhibadhiyaanavanukkuk Kattalaiyittu, Avargalaik Kaaththirukkumpadiseydhaan.
24 sila Naalaikkuppinbu Peliks Yoodhasthireeyaagiya Than Manaivi Thurusillaaludanekooda Vandhu, Pavulai Azhaippiththu Kiristhuvaippatrum Visuvaasaththaik Kuriththu Avan Sollakkettaan.

25 avan, Needhiyaiyum, Ichchaiyadakkaththaiyum, Inivarum Niyaayaththeerppaiyumkuriththup Pesugaiyil, Peliks Bayamadaindhu: Ippozhudhu Nee Pogalaam, Enakkuch Samayamaanabodhu Unnai Azhaippippen Endraan
26 melum, Avan Pavulai Vidudhalaipannumpadi Thanakku Avan Panankoduppaanendru Nambikkaiyullavanaayirundhaan; Adhinimiththam Avan Anegandharam Avanai Azhaiththu, Avanudane Pesinaan.

27 irandu Varusham Sendrapinbu Peliks Enbavanukkup Badhilaaip Porkkiyupesdhu Dhesaadhibadhiyaaga Vandhaan; Appozhudhu Peliks Yoodharukkuth Dhayavuseyya Manadhaaip Pavulaik Kaavalil Vaiththuvittupponaan.
